data.description: Pair items according to a 'best score'
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a pairing algorithm (like for pairing a go tournament) that
    uses a 'best score' method. An alternative name might be
    Algorithm::Pair::BestScore - slightly better description, but more
    verbose. Additional pairing algorithms might be
    Algorithm::Pair::RoundRobin, for example.
